require_face_auth_opt: Require for ONLY those with Face ID
resync_server: Missing data. Please resync with the server
thank_without_pause: You did not take a break. \nThe breaks are automatically deducted
confirmation_text: Do you really want to continue?
missing_face: Missing Face ID, please register the Face ID first.
missing_Face: Missing Face ID, please register the Face ID first.
check_internet: Check your connection and try again.
pinning_option_five: Then triple-click the side button to start Guided Access.
registered_face_loaded: Registered face loaded - ready for verification
no_registered_face: No registered face found for this employee
no_face_detected: No face detected - please look at camera
multiple_faces_detected: Multiple faces detected - please ensure only one person is in frame
move_closer: Move closer to camera - face too small
face_not_recognized: Face not recognized - please ensure you are the registered person
failed_to_process_face: Failed to process face - please try again
center_face_in_frame: Please center your face in the frame
face_does_not_match: Face does not match registered employee
face_similarity_too_low: Face similarity too low - please try again
face_verification_failed: Face verification failed - please try again
tensorflow_model_failed: TensorFlow model failed to load. Tap to retry.
model_loaded_successfully: Model loaded successfully! Center your face.
model_loading_failed: Model loading failed. Please restart the app.
camera_permission_denied: Camera or microphone permission denied. Please enable both permissions in settings.
no_cameras_available: No cameras available on this device.
camera_initialized_successfully: Camera initialized successfully. Center your face.
camera_controller_failed: Camera controller failed to initialize properly.
tensorflow_model_not_loaded: TensorFlow model not loaded. Please restart the app.
failed_to_process_face_retry: Failed to process face - please try again
failed_to_crop_face: Failed to crop face - please try again
error_processing_image: Error processing image. Please try again.
camera_permission_denied_only: Camera permission denied. Please enable camera permission in settings.
camera_permission_message: Camera access is required for face recognition. Please enable camera permission in app settings.
permission_required_message: This permission is required for the app to function properly. Please enable it in app settings.
camera_initialized_successfully_loading: Camera initialized successfully. Loading registered face...
storage_permission_message: Storage access is required for backup and restore functionality. Please enable storage permission in app settings.
archive_extraction_failed: Failed to extract records from archive file. Please check if the file is a valid ZIP containing JSON data.
you_are_not_scheduled: You are not scheduled to work today. Please contact your supervisor.
